member.name: M:SmartOffice.SmartTools.Serialization.Serialize(System.Object@,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Will save the data directly in a file.
member.param: Choose any kind of class object
Choose a directory | if it does not exit it will be created automatically. Do not include (\) at the end.
choose a file name | must be greater that 3 and without the (.) or the extension only the name of the file here.
Choose the extension you want without putting the (.)
Overwrite the file if it already exists?
member.returns: If string is empty then test is successfully done else put it in a msgbox or textbox object to read it.

member.summary: Will open a file and deserialize it
